trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SEQ_00<tab>Shale steels her heart for the work ahead.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Sphene in the outskirts.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_TODO_01<tab>Speak with outskirts inhabitants.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Sphene again.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_001<tab>It's time I went back to locating Calyx's lair.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_002<tab>I have a new strategy in mind, but it remains to be seen if it will aid in narrowing down the possibilities.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_003<tab>I'll ask Krile for help. I want to reexamine the data, starting with that of her parents.

TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_004<tab>After all, they were the first to break away from Preservation and establish an organized resistance with Oblivion. There must be something in there that can point us in the right direction.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_005<tab>What are your plans, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_006<tab>(-Sphene-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that you? Apologies for calling suddenly.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_007<tab>(-Sphene-)I've been making the rounds in the outskirts, and I cannot help but feel as though something is amiss.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_008<tab>(-Sphene-)Might I ask you to join me? Your perspective would be most appreciated. It can wait until you've finished attending to Shale, of course.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_009<tab>It seems your plans have been decided for you. Go on─I've others to speak with before I return to the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_010<tab>As long as the memories remain, this wound in my heart will never fully heal. But it might be better that way.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_SHALE_000_015<tab>To feel something─even pain─is to remember that they lived. And to know that I am still alive.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you for coming!
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_021<tab>As I mentioned, I would benefit from your worldly experience.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_022<tab>Perhaps it is my imagination, but the townspeople appear to be acting oddly. That is, even considering the current state of affairs.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_023<tab>As I am yet unfamiliar with the outskirts, I thought you might be better equipped to judge if their behavior is unusual or not.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_024<tab>Would you speak with them and see what you think? Though I hope to be proven wrong, I fear something is not right here...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_025<tab>It's nothing so obvious as loud wailing or acts of violence, but... Well, it would be best if you saw for yourself.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_026<tab>I'll be fine now, just fine...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_FRIGHTNED05367_000_027<tab>I can't... I can't go on like this...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_028<tab>Wh-What do you want...? You can't have my regulator!
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_030<tab>Greetings! I remember when you visited with Queen Sphene... Come to check on our well-being, have you?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_031<tab>Well, I can say that things are rather stressful out here as well.

TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_032<tab>Without knowing if or when our machinery might turn murderous, the specter of death is ever present. People are terrified, and the clamor for neo regulators has reached a fever pitch.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_033<tab>I, personally, was fortunate to have claimed a new device early on, and have long since completed the registration. Death has no hold over me now.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_034<tab>Now, I must begin my prayers. The darkness draws closer, grows deeper...and we must cast it out...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_PEPOANE_000_035<tab>I must pray...

TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_FRIGHTNED05367_000_040<tab>Oh, please tell me you brought more neo regulators! <var 1A 02 /var>Officially<var 1A 01 /var>, they've all been handed out already, but I've heard rumors there were a few left over...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_FRIGHTNED05367_000_041<tab>Surely the government still has some? Or perhaps Queen Sphene!?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_FRIGHTNED05367_000_042<tab>I may not look it, but I was a hunter once. Back then, I hardly gave death a second thought. But now that I know the truth, it's all I can think about!
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_FRIGHTNED05367_000_043<tab>There has to be a way to hold on. There has to...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_FRIGHTNED05367_000_045<tab>I can't go on like this...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_050<tab>You... You're not wearing a regulator!? Don't you know the end is coming!?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_051<tab>Well, it's your life to lose. Me? I got myself one of those neo regulators and registered a little while ago.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_052<tab>As soon as I did, a display appeared showing the number of registered users. Right now it's sitting at four thousand one hundred and sixty-eight.

TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_053<tab>The upper limit was five thousand, wasn't it? Seems the total shot up right after those machine malfunctions. It's only a matter of time before everyone's registered.

TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_054<tab>I pity those who weren't chosen, but <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> going to be an Endless. I'm going to evolve, and live happily ever after...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_BLACKREGULATOR05367_000_055<tab>I hope you come to your senses and get your hands on a neo regulator, friend!
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_060<tab>So, what do you think? Was I right to worry?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_A1_000_001<tab>Tensions are running high.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_A1_000_002<tab>Their fear is palpable.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_062<tab>Yes, that is exactly it...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_062<tab>The people are overwhelmed by uncertainty and fear. And with each new registration, that fear inside them grows more insistent...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_063<tab>How long until it drives them into full-blown panic?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALISAIE_000_064<tab>(-Alisaie-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Can you come to Resolution?
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>(-Alisaie-)We have a problem... I'm already here with Lamaty'i and Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_066<tab>It sounds like she wants us there in a hurry. We should go!
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>I'm sorry I couldn't be there in time. Krile told me everything that happened while we were away...

TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALPHINAUD_000_075<tab>First those deadly malfunctions, and now a city-wide announcement. He has spent considerable effort recruiting his five thousand Endless. Perhaps more than necessary, even...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>We had the hopefuls who descended on Lamaty'i disperse for now. We could see tempers in the crowd were starting to fray...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>This latest wave of attacks may not have been as widespread, but people are reaching their breaking point. We have to stop Calyx, and soon.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_GOSSAN_000_090<tab>My apologies. The sign is not responding to any of our attempts to change the display or switch it off...
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_100<tab>Calyx has access to the core system... Which means that if he chose to do so, he could deploy the soldiers beyond the barrier.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_100<tab>Even if our people learn to live with death and decide to leave the dome behind, they will not be beyond his reach.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ORIGINALSPHENE_110_100<tab>Yet if it serves to allay their fears even a little, I beg you, Wuk Lamat: please let them shelter in Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_WUKLAMAT_000_101<tab>We will welcome any and all who want to come. We've already begun evacuations, and we'll be able to pick up the pace once the Landsguard arrives.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALPHINAUD_000_103<tab>In which case, we had best spread out and keep an eye on the crowds. The mood is tense, and we must prepare for possible violence.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALISAIE_000_104<tab>If you happen to determine where Calyx is hiding, though, we'll be ready to move at a moment's notice.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_ALISAIE_100_104<tab>Surely we'll find a clue of some kind soon. He can't elude us forever.
TEXT_KINGMI104_05367_WUKLAMAT_000_105<tab>Violence and fear... This is not the future she envisioned for her nation.
